Generation IV.Diamond: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
Generation IV.Pearl: While its movements out of water are sluggish, it can swim as fast as any Feebas .
Generation IV.Platinum: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.
